physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe shortness of breath at rest, productive cough, worsening lung infections.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Prior to treatment, the patient felt significant anxiety due to severe shortness of breath. After beginning intravenous antibiotics and aggressive treatment regimen, he reported improvements in lung function and quality of life.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Continued management with inhaled antibiotics, mucolytics, they have performed regular airway clearance techniques.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient has reported sustained improvement and has not required hospitalization or intravenous antibiotics in the past 3 years.
